content:
GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode Enum

In this Article

[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

Indicates whether the next blocking garbage collection compacts the large object heap (LOH).

Syntax

Declaration

public enum GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • ValueType
  • System.Enum
  • GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode

Remarks

The value of the LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode property is a member of the GCLargeObjectHeapCompactionMode enumeration that indicates whether the next full blocking garbage collection also compacts the large object heap (LOH). By default, the LOH is not compacted. A value of CompactOnce indicates that the blocking garbage collection will compact the LOH. After the garbage collection, the value of the LargeObjectHeapCompactionMode property reverts to Default.

Fields

CompactOnce

The large object heap (LOH) will be compacted during the next blocking generation 2 garbage collection.
Default

The large object heap (LOH) is not compacted.
